title: ADum ayyan
sahitya:
ADum ayyan azhaikkinrAn pugazh kUDum tillai tanil kuncita padameDuttu


anupallavi

  nADi vandiDil nalam aruLvEnenru tEDarun kazhaleDuttu Adakamanrinil


caraNam    antarattOr vandu aNDi vaNangiDa vandiyar palar shUzhndu vAzhttip-pOTriDa
maNDalam engilum mangaLam niraidiDa sundarar tOzhanAm sugunap-prakAshanAm
